message: Clear stands up and spreads his arms.

What is he―<K>
And then, Clear starts to sing.
His voice fills the space, drowning out all other sounds.

name: 紅雀
message: "Whoa. You're canceling out the noise with your song? How's that even possible?"
Some guards try to rush Clear, but Koujaku sends them and their Allmates flying.
I close my eyes again and try to concentrate. It feels like it might actually work this time.
Koujaku forces back another group of guards.

name: 紅雀
message: "Isn't there anything that could help you concentrate?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh... Oh! I know! Maybe if I could see my own eyes."
Koujaku thinks for a moment, then grins.
After he knocks back another set of guards, he crouches down in front of me and stabs his sword into the ground.
I see my face in the blade of the sword. I can use it as a mirror!
I stare into my reflection's eyes. The words fall from my lips unthinking.
Little by little, the world around me fades.
Clear's voice grows distant, swallowed by the sound of my heartbeat.
And beneath that, the faint sound of waves.
